entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:29 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -39.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 07:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -39.2°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -43.2°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 36. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 29. POP 30%
